price: But We saved him and those who were in the Ark, and We made it[4] a sign for all people.
arabic: فَأَنجَيۡنَٰهُ وَأَصۡحَٰبَ ٱلسَّفِينَةِ وَجَعَلۡنَٰهَآ ءَايَةٗ لِّلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
footnotes: [4] i.e., the Ark or the story.
